thread.title: Bruce Lee 4 Days (First Monday) Box Office Collections, Area-wise Break Up
thread.title_full: Bruce Lee 4 Days (First Monday) Box Office Collections, Area-wise Break Up

title: Bruce Lee 4 Days (First Monday) Box Office Collections, Area-wise Break Up
text:
Posted by: Pravallika Anjuri Updated: Tuesday, October 20, 2015, 15:12 [IST] 
Ram Charan 's Bruce Lee The Fighter which released amidst fans galore and huge expectations, disappointed mega fans largely and received backlash from general audience for its routine content. Bruce Lee - The Fighter (U/A): Book Your Tickets Right Away! 
But has however, become stable at the box office, which might make it an average film after the full run. Surprisingly, the film picked up at the box office on its first Monday while it performed below par during the weekend. 
The official festival holidays that were announced in Telugu states from today, might further help the film from now on. 
But, 
Bruce Lee only collected around $680K in USA and 1 Million mark appears tough for the actor to pull off. In fact Ram Charan is the only star hero in Tollywood, to not score a million at the US box office till now, which is making mega fans worry more. 
Nevertheless, Bruce Lee has collected a share of 23.06 Cr in Andhra Pradesh and Telangana after 4 days of release and continuing to do a decent business. 
Check out the area-wise breakup of Bruce Lee 4 days box office collections in the slides below. Bruce Lee 4 Days Box Office Collections, Area-wise Break Up 1/9 Nizam 
Bruce Lee The Fighter starring Ram Charan, Rakul, directed by Sreenu Vaitla collected a share of 6.75 Cr in Nizam after 4 days of release. The film also features Chiranjeevi in a cameo role. Bruce Lee 4 Days Box Office Collections, Area-wise Break Up 2/9 Vizag 
Bruce Lee collected a share of 2.75 Cr in Vizag after 4 days of release. Vizag has been on the strongest revenue generating places for the mega hero films. Bruce Lee 4 Days Box Office Collections, Area-wise Break Up 3/9 Ceeded 
Bruce Lee The Fighter, directed by Sreenu Vaitla collected a share of 4.50 Cr in Ceeded. Ram Charan holds a strong fan base in the area. Bruce Lee 4 Days Box Office Collections, Area-wise Break Up 4/9 Nellore 
Bruce Lee The Fighter collected a share of 1.08 Cr in Nellore after 4 days of release. The film deals about brother and sister sentiment. Bruce Lee 4 Days Box Office Collections, Area-wise Break Up 5/9 Krishna 
Bruce Lee collected a share of 1.45 Cr in Krishna after 4 days of release. The film's songs were already topping the charts. Bruce Lee 4 Days Box Office Collections, Area-wise Break Up 6/9 Guntur 
Bruce Lee collected a share of 2.55 Cr in Guntur after 4 days of release. Comedy scenes between Rakul and Charan worked out well. Bruce Lee 4 Days Box Office Collections, Area-wise Break Up 7/9 East 
Bruce Lee collected a share of 2.17 Cr in East Godvari after 4 days of release. SRK visited the sets of the film during a song shoot. Bruce Lee 4 Days Box Office Collections, Area-wise Break Up 8/9 West 
Bruce Lee collected a share of 1.81 Cr in West Godavari after 4 days of release. Chiranjeevi cameo did not really help much for the film's box office. You might like
